content: yarn choose a medium-weight yarn in your colour of choice you can also add a touch of sparkle with metallic or glittery yarns perfect for a holiday vibe for a rustic feel try natural wool in earthy tones if you want your trees to pop pick a contrasting color for the trunk what i used yarn for trees natural coloured cotton yarn yarn for garland rose coloured organic hemp cord hook size 3 5 measurement of one completed tree height 8 cm width 7cm please note your size might be slightly different depending on your crochet style and the hook and yarn you use
